trans-unit.source: Hosts a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 承载的集合<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn class is a specialized type of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> class used to logically host cells that indicate binary state.
trans-unit.target: DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn 类是特殊的类型的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>类用于对逻辑上承载的单元格指示二进制状态。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>

trans-unit.source: A DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn has an associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell> in every <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> that intersects it.
trans-unit.target: DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn 具有的关联<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>中每个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>相交它。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>

trans-unit.source: Each cell supplies a user interface (UI) that is similar to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 每个单元格都提供类似于的用户界面 (UI)<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>

trans-unit.source: The default sort mode for this column type is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>.
trans-unit.target: 此列类型的默认排序模式是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>

trans-unit.source: Typically, check box cell values are intended either for storage, like any other data, or for performing bulk operations.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，复选框单元格值旨在用于存储，如任何其他数据，或执行大容量操作。

trans-unit.source: If you want to respond immediately when users click a check box cell, you can handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick?displayProperty=fullName> event, but this event occurs before the cell value is updated.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要立即当用户单击复选框单元格，你可以处理响应<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick?displayProperty=fullName>事件，但此事件发生之前更新单元格的值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If you need the new value at the time of the click, one option is to calculate what the expected value will be based on the current value.
trans-unit.target: 如果在单击时需要的新值，一个选项是计算所需的值将是基于当前值。

trans-unit.source: Another approach is to commit the change immediately, and handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged?displayProperty=fullName> event to respond to it.
trans-unit.target: 另一种方法是立即提交更改并处理该<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged?displayProperty=fullName>事件来响应它。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To commit the change when the cell is clicked, you must handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要在单击单元格时，请提交更改，你必须处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: In the handler, if the current cell is a check box cell, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method and pass in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts> value.
trans-unit.target: 在处理程序中，如果当前单元格，复选框单元格调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法并传入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts>值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn"></xref> class to the default state.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn"></xref>类为默认状态。

trans-unit.source: Using this default constructor is equivalent to supplying an argument of `false` to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%29> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 使用此默认构造函数和提供的自变量是等效`false`到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%29>构造函数。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%29>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn"></xref> and configures it to display check boxes with two or three states.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn"></xref>和将其配置为显示带两个或三个状态的复选框。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the column by setting the following properties.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数初始化通过设置以下属性的列。

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>|A new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell> with its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.ThreeState%2A> property initialized to the `threeState` parameter value.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.ThreeState%2A>|The value of the `threeState` parameter.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName>| |The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property.|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName>| |The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property.|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState?displayProperty=fullName> if `threeState` is `true`; otherwise, `false`.|
trans-unit.target: |属性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>|初始化为其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.ThreeState%2A>属性与新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>`threeState`参数值。 | |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.ThreeState%2A>|值`threeState`参数。 | |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A>属性返回的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A>属性。 |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A>属性返回的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>属性。 |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState?displayProperty=fullName> if `threeState` is `true`; otherwise, `false`.|</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.ThreeState%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.ThreeState%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to display check boxes with three states; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to display check boxes with two states.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要显示具有三种状态; 的复选框<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>以显示带两个状态的复选框。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template used to create new cells.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于创建新单元格的模板。

trans-unit.source: The constructors for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn> class initialize this property to a newly created <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn>类初始化到新创建的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>此属性</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn>的构造函数

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Changing the properties of the cell template will not immediately affect the user interface (UI) of the column's existing cells.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!CAUTION]&1;> 更改单元格模板的属性不会立即影响的列的现有单元格的用户界面 (UI)。

trans-unit.source: These changes are only apparent after the column is regenerated (for example, by sorting the column or through a call to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.InvalidateColumn%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method).
trans-unit.target: 重新生成列后，这些更改才明显 (例如，通过对列进行排序或通过调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.InvalidateColumn%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法)。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.InvalidateColumn%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> that all other cells in the column are modeled after.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>列中的所有其他单元格建模之后。

trans-unit.source: The default value is a new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是一种新<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell"></xref>实例。

trans-unit.source: The property is set to a value that is not of type <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 属性设置为的类型不是值<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the column's default cell style.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置列的默认单元格样式。

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> returned by this property has the following initial property values: |`DataGridViewCellStyle` property|Default value| |--------------------------------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState?displayProperty=fullName> if the initial <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.ThreeState%2A> property value is `true`; otherwise, `false`.| These values override the value specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, but may be overridden by other cell style properties.
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回的默认<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>具有以下的初始属性值: |`DataGridViewCellStyle`属性 |默认值 | |--------------------------------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>|如果初始<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.ThreeState%2A>属性值是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState?displayProperty=fullName>`true`; 否则为`false`。 | 这些值重写中指定的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件，但可能由其他单元格样式属性重写。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.ThreeState%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的单元格样式](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> property of the object returned by the DefaultCellStyle property has a value of `false`, changing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.ThreeState%2A> property value to `true` automatically sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>DefaultCellStyle 属性返回的对象的属性具有的值`false`、 变化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.ThreeState%2A>属性值设置为`true`自动设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.ThreeState%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> has a value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>, changing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.ThreeState%2A> property value to `false` automatically sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>的值为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>、 变化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.ThreeState%2A>属性值设置为`false`自动设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>到`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.ThreeState%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> to be applied as the default style.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref>作为默认样式应用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the underlying value corresponding to a cell value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, which appears as an unchecked box.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置基础值对应的一个单元格值<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>，显示为未选中的框。

trans-unit.source: The FalseValue, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.TrueValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.IndeterminateValue%2A> properties determine the associated values of these states as they occur in the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: FalseValue， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.TrueValue%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.IndeterminateValue%2A>属性确定这些状态相关联的值，因为它们在基础数据源中发生。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.IndeterminateValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.TrueValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FalseValue%2A> property of the cell object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此属性获取或设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FalseValue%2A>属性返回的单元格对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FalseValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FalseValue%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性还将设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FalseValue%2A>属性中的列和刷新每个单元格的列显示。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FalseValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: 若要替代各个单元格的指定的值，请设置该列的值后设置单元格的值。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> representing a value that the cells in this column will treat as a <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>表示一个值，此列中的单元格将被视为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>值。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>属性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the flat style appearance of the check box cells.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置复选框单元格的平面样式外观。

trans-unit.source: To display the check box cells using visual styles, set this property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle> and call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method before <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Run%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 若要显示使用视觉样式的复选框单元格，请将此属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle>和调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法之前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Run%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Run%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle>

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FlatStyle%2A> property of the cell object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此属性获取或设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FlatStyle%2A>属性返回的单元格对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FlatStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FlatStyle%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性还将设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FlatStyle%2A>属性中的列和刷新每个单元格的列显示。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FlatStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: 若要替代各个单元格的指定的值，请设置该列的值后设置单元格的值。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"></xref> value indicating the appearance of cells in the column.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"> </xref>值，该值指示列中的单元格的外观。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>属性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the underlying value corresponding to an indeterminate or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> cell value, which appears as a disabled checkbox.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置基础值对应于不确定或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>单元值，该值显示为已禁用的复选框。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.FalseValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.TrueValue%2A>, and IndeterminateValue properties determine the associated values of these states as they occur in the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.FalseValue%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.TrueValue%2A>，和 IndeterminateValue 属性确定这些状态相关联的值，因为它们在基础数据源中发生。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.TrueValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.FalseValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.IndeterminateValue%2A> property of the cell object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此属性获取或设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.IndeterminateValue%2A>属性返回的单元格对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.IndeterminateValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.IndeterminateValue%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性还将设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.IndeterminateValue%2A>属性中的列和刷新每个单元格的列显示。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.IndeterminateValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: 若要替代各个单元格的指定的值，请设置该列的值后设置单元格的值。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> representing a value that the cells in this column will treat as an indeterminate value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>表示一个值，此列中的单元格将被视为不确定的值。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>属性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the hosted check box cells will allow three check states rather than two.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值三个复选状态，而不是两个是否允许托管的复选框单元格。

trans-unit.source: The indeterminate state can be useful, for example, when you do not want to set a default value in the check box.
trans-unit.target: 不确定状态非常有用，例如，如果您不想在复选框中设置默认值。

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.ThreeState%2A> property of the cell object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此属性获取或设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.ThreeState%2A>属性返回的单元格对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.ThreeState%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.ThreeState%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性还将设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.ThreeState%2A>属性中的列和刷新每个单元格的列显示。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.ThreeState%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: 若要替代各个单元格的指定的值，请设置该列的值后设置单元格的值。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property has a value of `false`, changing the ThreeState property value to `true` automatically sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>属性返回的对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A>属性具有的值`false`，更改不确定状态属性值设置为`true`自动设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> has a value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>, changing the ThreeState property value to `false` automatically sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>的值为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>，更改不确定状态属性值设置为`false`自动设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>到`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the hosted <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell"></xref> objects are able to have a third, indeterminate, state; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果将托管<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell"></xref>对象是能够具有第三个、 不确定的状态; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>属性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that describes the column.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个描述该列的字符串。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that describes the column.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>用于描述列。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the underlying value corresponding to a cell value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, which appears as a checked box.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置基础值对应的一个单元格值<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>，显示为复选框。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.FalseValue%2A>, TrueValue, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.IndeterminateValue%2A> properties determine the associated values of these states as they occur in the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.FalseValue%2A>，TrueValue，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.IndeterminateValue%2A>属性确定这些状态相关联的值，因为它们在基础数据源中发生。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.IndeterminateValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.FalseValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.TrueValue%2A> property of the cell object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此属性获取或设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.TrueValue%2A>属性返回的单元格对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.TrueValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.TrueValue%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性还将设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.TrueValue%2A>属性中的列和刷新每个单元格的列显示。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.TrueValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: 若要替代各个单元格的指定的值，请设置该列的值后设置单元格的值。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> representing a value that the cell will treat as a <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>表示一个值，该单元格将被视为<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>值。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>属性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>
